title: Software Developer
name: Jesus Jimenez
description:
Hi there! I'm Jesus Jimenez. I'm an experienced software developer from Venezuela. I've been freelancing for 2 years and I'm dedicated to delivering high-quality work.

I specialize in full-stack web development and I'm well-versed in modern technologies. I'm passionate about software engineering and I'm particularly interested in Back-end web development, DevOps, data engineering, machine learning, and cybersecurity.

I'm flexible, and always eager to learn new technologies, and I'm confident that my skills and dedication will bring value to your team and contribute to the success of your project. Let's work together and make your project a success!
about:
My name is Jesus Jimenez, and I am a Software developer and freelancer based in Venezuela. I was born on September 22, 1998 and I am currently pursuing my Computer Engineering degree at the "Universidad Nacional Experimental del Tachira (UNET)" in San Cristobal, Venezuela. In February 2023, I will be starting my Master's degree in Big Data at the IMF Academy in Madrid, Spain.

I have a passion for software engineering, and all-things programming. At the age of 9 I hosted my own Habbo Hotel Retro server on a blog, that was my very first experience with programming. Since then I'm a geek.

I am also an avid fan of Progressive Rock/Metal music, my favorite bands include Opeth, Soen, Karnivool, Tool, and Leprous. I'm not a game but I do spent more time than what I would like in video games like League of Legends, Dota 2, and Magic The Gathering.
